archimate:Requirement.name: PM.1.2.1: There should be a requirement for employees to accept terms and conditions of employment in writing, and for external individuals (e.g. consultants, contractors, engineers and service employees) to sign non-disclosure/confidentiality agreements.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
